The Fastest Snail in the World: Benny is a small, brown snail who lives in a garden. He has always been fascinated by the world outside his garden, and he dreams of exploring it. Benny's speed is unmatched, and he becomes the talk of the garden. Benny embarks on a journey to discover new things and make new friends, proving that even the smallest creatures can have a big impact.

The Fastest Snail in the World: Benny is a young snail who has always been fascinated by speed. He spends every day practicing and perfecting his technique, and his hard work pays off when he becomes the fastest snail in the world. Benny's speed allows him to travel vast distances and see new places, but he never forgets his roots and always returns to his home in the garden.
